#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	unsigned long a,b,c,d,e,f;
	cin>>a;
	while(a--)
	{
       cin>>b;
       c=b/7;
       d=b%7;
       e=d%4;
       if(e>c)
       {
       	cout<<"-1"<<endl;
       }
       else
       {
       c=c-e;
       f=7*c;
       cout<<f<<endl;
       }
	}
	return 0;
}
